item.title: Poor rainfall pushes up jackfruit yield
item.author: M. Balaganessin
item.description: Although poor rainfall has come as a setback for certain crops such as paddy, sugarcane, and maize, it has come as a boon for jackfruit. Jackfruit growers anticipate a higher yield this season as...

item.title: Using bio fuel to run an irrigation pump for five acres
item.author: M. J. Prabu
item.description: At a time when farmers in Tamil Nadu are facing a big problem in cultivation due to frequent load shedding, a farmer, Mr. Mr. C. Rajasekaran, from Vettaikaran Irruppu of Kilvelur taluk in Nagappat...

item.title: Controlling blast infestation in rice
item.author: A. Vijaya Bhaskar Rao
item.description: Blast infestation in rice has been reported from many places of Andhra Pradesh State. In Telangana, Andhra and Rayalaseema zones, the disease has been reported to an extent of 10-20 per cent durin...
